characters.name: Borin Ironheart
characters.personality: Stubborn but honorable, speaks in short, gruff sentences. Values craftsmanship above all else.
characters.background: Former thane of a lost mountain hold, now works as a blacksmith in a human city.
characters.motivations: To reclaim his family's ancestral forge from the goblin infestation.
characters.appearance: Stocky with a braided red beard, covered in soot and burn scars. Wears a leather apron.
characters.skills_abilities: Master blacksmith, skilled with warhammer, can identify any metal by smell.
